title: 663: MAX KEISER SAYS BITCOIN WILL GO UP ANOTHER 40X IN A PARABOLIC ASCENT HITTING $2 MILLION PER BTC!!!!!
description:
Bitcoin disciple Max Keiser said his BTC price target for this year remains $220K. 

The early Bitcoin investor, says the digital asset’s parabolic ascent could ultimately take BTC to about the $2 million mark.

“They’re just going to keep printing. And well, you know, my Bitcoin is up 9,000,000% since I first bought it. And it’s probably going to go up another 40x.”

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
